name: XR Tools: 3D UI Generator
description:
A quick and easy way to prototype 3D, VR and AR surfaces without ever leaving Figma.


3D UI Generator automatically scales and adjusts any graphic, board or frame to create a 3D surface + environment. It supports full rotation, scale, zoom, FOV and curve amount in perspective 3D and isometric views.


NEW: 3D grid helpers, custom colors, transparent and full scene exports. A 3D user can be toggled for immersive testing with animated gestures.
